name: Midukki-RoBoT
description: Midukki-RoBoT is an all in one group management bot made for managing your group effectively with some advance security tools & Suit For All Your Needs ❤️

CHANNELS.description: Username or ID of channel or group. Separate multiple IDs by space

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the collections. Defaults to Telegram_files. If you are using the same database, then use different collection name for each bot

DATABASE_NAME.description: Name of the database in https://www.mongodb.com/. For more help watch this https://youtu.be/mD9veNL7KoE

DATABASE_URL.description: Name of the database in https://www.mongodb.com/. For more help watch this https://youtu.be/mD9veNL7KoE

FORCE_SUB.description: ID of channel. Without subscribing this channel users cannot use Autofilter

LOG_CHANNEL.description: A channel to log the activities of bot. Make sure bot is an admin in the channel

DONATION_LINK.description: enter your gpay, pypal etc.. link

AUTH_USERS.description: Username or ID of users to give access of inline search & pm filter. Separate multiple users by space. Leave it empty if you don't want to restrict bot usage.

AUTH_GROUPS.description: ID of groups which bot should work as autofilter, bot can only work in thease groups. If not given , bot can be used in any group.

BOT_PICS.description: Telegraph links of images to show in start message.( Multiple images can be used separated by space )

LOADING_MODE.description: Loading feature ON/OFF. this features worked in callback

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Your Support chat url or Your Link [with https:// or https://t.me/] Don't use @
